title: Captain Cook safari
creator_credit: Cine Service, General Motors Holden and Geoffrey Thompson
brief_description: General Motors Holden’s trial drivers and a Brisbane T.V. team travel from Brisbane to Cooktown in four new production model vehicles, to commemorate the bi-centenary of Captain Cook’s 100 days on the Queensland coast. They visit the points where Captain Cook’s expedition landed in 1770. Shows the different terrain and driving conditions in route. Narrated by Geoff Raymond and photographed by Ken Jacoby.
